structure.unit: ARTICLE VI. OFFICE OF FAIR EMPLOYMENT PRACTICES

text.section:
Sec. 11A-35. Definitions.
When used herein:
Affirmative action shall mean a program to ensure equal employment opportunity and treatment for all qualified individuals without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, disability, sex, marital status, pregnancy, veteran's status or sexual orientation, and to every extent possible, eliminate areas of underutilization in employment of minorities, women and persons with disabilities. However, nothing in this section shall be interpreted to require the County to grant preferential treatment to any individual because of sexual orientation.
Office shall mean the Miami-Dade County Office of Fair Employment Practices, a division of the Office of the County Manager.
